Frequently Asked Questions

How can I purchase the book?

The book is currently being finalized for publication. Contact me directly to express interest and be notified when it becomes available.

When will the online course be available?

The course is in active development. Join the waitlist on the Course page to be notified when enrollment opens and receive early-bird pricing.

Do you offer personal consultations?

Yes! I offer one-on-one consultations for parents seeking personalized guidance. Contact me with details about your needs and I'll provide information about availability and pricing.

Are you available for speaking engagements?

Absolutely! I speak at educational conferences, parent workshops, and professional development events. Reach out with details about your event and I'll respond promptly.
